text: Robert Robinson (27 March 1910 – 22 January 1989) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1989 deaths Category:People from County Durham (district) Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Hebburn Colliery F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Guildford City F.C. players Category:Norwich City F.C. players Category:Barrow A.F.C. players Category:Scarborough F.C. players Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Bob Robinson (footballer, born 1910)
